Package colorguard

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicPiece
    BasicPiece is a type of Piece with the ability to move 2 squares in each direction.
    Client
    Client class uses server sockets and acts as a client that connects to a server
    Clone
    Clone is a powerup, hence it extends Powerup.
    Colorguard
    The Colorguard class stores the state of the game and changes certain objects dynamically based on commands Colorguard stores the GameBoard, turns, and the state of a turn
    Diagonal
    The Diagonal class is a type of Piece and thus extends Piece.
    Flag
    Flag is a type of GameObject.
    GameBoard
    GameBoard class represents the board the game is played on It stores the jails, flag zones, and powerups To update the board, several methods are available, mainly movePiece(Piece p)
    GameObject
    GameObject serves as the superclass for all objects in the game (Pieces and Powerups).
    GameRun  
    GameWindow
    GameWindow is the GUI of Colorguard.
    HighJump
    HighJump class enables a Piece to jump over defenses for 3 turns
    HighWall
    HighWall class prevents all enemies from jumping over defenses, excluding Teleporter
    Hopper
    Hopper is a type of Piece that can jump over other Pieces by default Can move 3 spaces in all directions Hopper can be neutralized by HighWall Powerup
    Invincibility
    Invincibility is a type of Powerup that makes a Piece immune to tags for 4 turns
    Invisibility
    Invisibility class that makes a Piece invisible for some turns
    Jailbreak
    Jailbreak is a specific powerup.
    Location
    Location class represents a 2D point on a grid.
    LongRange
    LongRange is a type of Piece that can move 6 spots vertically.
    MoveBoost
    MoveBoost powerup that increases a Pieces existing movement ability by 1 in all directions for 5 turns.
    Paralysis
    Paralysis class that prevents all enemies in a 7 by 7 around a given Piece for 2 turns
    Piece
    This class is the general abstract Piece class where it holds all the generic characteristics of a piece.
    Powerup
    Powerup inherits GameObject and serves as a superclass to all powerups in ther game.
    RoleReversal
    RoleReversal powerup allows a Piece to tag an opponent on the other side.
    RunAsClient
    Runs a game from the client side.
    RunAsServer
    Creates a game at a new Server of specified port.
    Server
    Server is used for networking
    Swapper
    Swapper classes flips any 2 given pieces on the board for one side
    TagRadius
    TagRadius class gives a Piece the ability to tag enemies in a 5 by 5 square around them.
    Teleporter
    Teleporter is a type of Piece that can move in a 5 by 5 grid around the Piece
    Throw
    Throw class enables a Piece to throw the flag to a team mate in the enemy starting side.
